body: Don't make the wife end up with that guy even though oppa fucked up I still feel like oppa and the wife should still love each other and be together still, make a happy ending instead because it seems like it's the opposite rn.
thank you, it was a great read

I'm speechless, i love the story and i read it more like a new manga than just a porn. Can't wait for the ending.
Very good job

God he should have just asked to use her phone. but GOD DAMN what a girl..."that girl is so dangerous" XD cant wait for the ending. Though i think the wife will just be with the husband in the end. (unless they want a shocking ending then that would not be the case)
